subject: Hockey, Ice
Smell
Odors
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Whether you call it a “stinky glove” or a “face wash,” it has been a baiting tactic in the hockey rink since gloves were invented.
snippet: Whether you call it a “stinky glove” or a “face wash,” it has been a baiting tactic in the hockey rink since gloves were invented.
